entry.title: Identify the category of drug which acts to prevent blood from clotting

link.title: Identify the category of drug which acts to prevent blood from clotting

entry.content:
Identify the category of drug which acts to prevent blood from clotting

(a) Analgesic

(b) Antibiotic

(c) Anticoagulant

(d) Antidiuretic
entry.summary: Identify the category of drug which acts to prevent blood from clotting

entry.title: Which of the following is NOT a class of Antifungal

link.title: Which of the following is NOT a class of Antifungal

entry.content:

(a) Allyamines

(b) Antimetabolites

(c) Azoles

(d) Macrolides
entry.summary: Which of the following is NOT a class of Antifungal

entry.title: Which of the following is NOT a Triazole

link.title: Which of the following is NOT a Triazole

entry.content:
Which of the following is NOT a Triazole

(a) Clotrimazole

(b) Fluconazole

(c) Itraconazole

(d) Voriconazole
entry.summary: Which of the following is NOT a Triazole

entry.title: Programmed cell death is
entry.content:
Programmed cell death is

(a) Cell lysis

(b) Autolysis

(c) Autotomy

(d) Apoptosis

entry.title: Neuropathy is adverse effect of
entry.content:
Neuropathy is adverse effect of

(a) Isoniazid

(b) Ethambutol

(c) Pyrazinamide

(d) Dapsone

entry.title: Phase 0 studies means
entry.content:
Phase 0 studies means

(a) First in human microdosing studies

(b) Part of phase I studies of clinical trials

(c) In vitro studies

(d) Studies carried out on small number of animals
entry.summary: Phase 0 studies means (a) First in human microdosing studies

entry.title: In DNA replication the newly added nucleotide is joined to the growing DNA strand by an enzyme

link.title: In DNA replication the newly added nucleotide is joined to the growing DNA strand by an enzyme

entry.content:
In DNA replication the newly added nucleotide is joined to the growing DNA strand by an enzyme

(a) DNA polymerase

(b) DNA ligase

(c) Restriction endonuclease

(d) Reverse transcriptase
entry.summary: In DNA replication the newly added nucleotide is joined to the growing DNA strand by an enzyme
